com.tome25.utils.version

Class VersionControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tome25.utils.version.VersionControl

  • public class VersionControl
extends Object
    A utility class to check library versions.
    Author:
    ToMe25

      Gets this libraries version number split into its components, if this is still in a Jar, if not this will return [1, 0].

      Gets the version number of the given library as a string, if it was registered prior to this call, if not this will return "1.0".

      • getVersion

        @Deprecated
public static int getVersion()
        Deprecated. 
        gets this libraries build number, if this is still in a Jar, if not this will return 0;
        Returns:
        the build number.

      • getMajor

        public static int getMajor()
        Gets the major part of this libraries version number, or 1 if it isn't available.
        Returns:
        the major version.

      • getMinor

        public static int getMinor()
        Gets the minor part of this libraries version number, or 0 if it isn't available.
        Returns:
        the minor version.

      • getBuild

        public static int getBuild()
        Gets the build/patch part of this libraries version number, or 0 if it isn't available.
        Returns:
        the build number.

      • getPatch

        public static int getPatch()
        Gets the build/patch part of this libraries version number, or 0 if it isn't available.
        Returns:
        the build number.

      • getVersionArray

        public static int[] getVersionArray()
        Gets this libraries version number split into its components, if this is still in a Jar, if not this will return [1, 0]. the used format is [MAJOR, MINOR, BUILD].
        Returns:
        the version number.

      • getVersionString

        public static String getVersionString()
        Gets this libraries version number as a string, if this is still in a Jar, if not this will return 1.0. the used format is "MAJOR.MINOR.BUILD".
        Returns:
        the version number.

      • setVersionString

        public static void setVersionString(String name,
                                    String versionString)
        Set the currently used version of a library. This sets both the String, and the Array.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the library.
        versionString - the version of the library. Please use the format "MAJOR.MINOR.BUILD", as this utility wont be able to handle anything else.

      • setVersionArray

        public static void setVersionArray(String name,
                                   int[] versionArray)
        Set the currently used version of a library. This sets both the String, and the Array.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the library.
        versionArray - the version of the library. Please use the format [MAJOR, MINOR, BUILD], as this utility wont be able to handle anything else.

      • getVersionString

        public static String getVersionString(String name)
        Gets the version number of the given library as a string, if it was registered prior to this call, if not this will return "1.0". The used format is "MAJOR.MINOR.BUILD", if the library adding it didn't mess up.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the library to check.
        Returns:
        the version number.

      • getVersionArray

        public static int[] getVersionArray(String name)
        Gets the version number of the given library as a string, if it was registered prior to this call, if not this will return "1.0". The used format is "MAJOR.MINOR.BUILD", if the library adding it didn't mess up.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the library to check.
        Returns:
        the version number.

      • getMajor

        public static int getMajor(String name)
        Gets the major part of the given libraries version number, or 1 if it isn't available.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the library to check.
        Returns:
        the major version.

      • getMinor

        public static int getMinor(String name)
        Gets the minor part of the given libraries version number, or 0 if it isn't available.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the library to check.
        Returns:
        the minor version.

        public static int getBuild(String name)
        Gets the build/patch part of the given libraries version number, or 0 if it isn't available.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the build number.

        public static int getPatch(String name)
        Gets the build/patch part of the given libraries version number, or 0 if it isn't available.

        Returns:
